ComicInfo.Title: Moronica’s Closet; The Lighter Side of…; Other Y2K Problems Guaranteed to Make Your Life Miserable; Sean “Puffy” Combs Day Planner; Scenes of Americana, Yesterday & Today; They Shoot Horses’ Asses, Don’t They?; Clues Your High School’s Football Team Really Sucks; Absentee Excuse Notes Through History; The Positive Side of the Y2K Problem; End-of-the-Millennium War Awards; Monroe and... the Candy; A Mad Look at Funerals; Mad Looks at What’s on the Back of Your Ticket
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, school, sports, messages, food, air travel, rationalizing, accidents, therapy, relationships, the office, enlightenment, and doctors.
ComicInfo.Writer: Josh Gordon,Dave Berg,Mike Snider,Duck Edwing,John Caldwell,Barry Liebmann,Rick Geary,Michael Gallagher,Anthony Barbieri,Sergio Aragonés,Desmond Devlin,Butch D'Ambrosio
